      • userExists

        public static boolean userExists(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,User> existingUsers,
                                 java.lang.String username)
        Signify if the username is taken or not
        Parameters:
        existingUsers - a hashmap of existing users with taken usernames
        username - the username the user wants to use with their new account
        Returns:
        true if the username is taken
